{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06045v1", "title": "Strichartz estimates for Critical magnetic Schrödinger operators on
  flat Euclidean cones", "summary": "In this paper, we study Schr\"{o}dinger operator $\mathcal{H}_{\mathbf{A}}$
perturbed by critical magnetic potentials on the 2D flat cone $\Sigma =
C(\mathbb{S}_\rho^1) = (0, \infty) \times \mathbb{S}_\rho^1$, which is a
product cone over the circle $\mathbb{S}_\rho^1 = \mathbb{R}/2\pi \rho
\mathbb{Z}$ with radius $\rho > 0$, and equipped with the metric $g = dr^2 +
r^2 d\theta^2$. The goal of this work is to establish Strichartz estimates for
$\mathcal{H}_{\mathbf{A}}$ in this setting. A key aspect of our approach is the
construction of the Schwartz kernel of the resolvent and the spectral measure
for Schr\"{o}dinger operator on the flat Euclidean cone $(\Sigma, g)$. The
results presented here generalize previous work in \cite{Ford, BFM, FZZ,
Zhang1}.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-08T13:45:19Z"}
